meanings.definition: A type of red wine produced in Italy.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a glass of lambruscos with my dinner last night.
meanings.sent2: The lambruscos paired perfectly with the pasta dish.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone wanted a taste of the delicious lambruscos.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the lambruscos filled the room, inviting everyone to indulge.
meanings.sent5: The deep red color of the lambruscos reminded me of ripe cherries.

meanings.definition: Plural form of lambrusco, referring to multiple bottles or glasses of the wine.
meanings.sent1: We bought three lambruscos for the celebration.
meanings.sent2: The table was adorned with various lambruscos for the guests.
meanings.sent3: As the evening went on, the empty lambruscos piled up on the counter.
meanings.sent4: The clinking of the lambruscos being poured added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the many lambruscos on the shelf was a true delight.
